game.name: Color Pipes
game.description:
This time we have got you covered with a brand new arcade game where you have to solve a series of colorful flow puzzles! Are you ready to take on this unique challenge? Join Color Pipes and get ready to connect dots of the same color to achieve your flow state! When you click the play button, you would enter a board full of colored dots, two of each color. Now your job is to connect the pairs and let the water flow properly in the well connected pipes. 

It sounds easy, but you can face off the challenges when you enter this fun puzzle challenge. Make sure that you touch every empty cell shown on the board and avoid crossing the pipes one another while connecting the matching dots. Try to put your logical analysis, brain power and puzzle-solving abilities to the test to link up all the pairs of colored dots and clear each level. Try to use as few moves as possible to solve each puzzle!

There are 120 unique and challenging levels to play through. The fun theme and music combined with the clean and minimalistic design and the ability to reverse your moves will keep you engrossed for hours. The best part is that you do not need to unlock the advanced level to try it out. Play any level anytime you want to practice your dots connecting abilities! You can enjoy this brain game on any browser you want in multiple devicses including mobile phone, desktop and tablet. Good luck to have fun alone or with your friends and families, no download required!
